page.shortlink: api international days of the week function
page.description: Returns day of week, using current culture settings

argument.name: C Result =
argument.description: Days of the week, one per line

argument.name: options
argument.description: (optional) Comma-delimited list of parameter-value expressions, such as: language=cultureCode, short, shortest, start-dayName

page.example:
? international_days_of_week() = Sunday Monday ...
? international_days_of_week("start-monday,shortest") = Mo Tu ...
' german ? international_days_of_week("language=de") = Sonntag Montag ..

section.description: The months and days returned are in UTF8 , so when dealing with the Web applications, you can take the output as is. However, when working from a desktop application (which assumes ACP) , you will need to call convert_utf8_to_acp()
